scripts.package: (rm -r source/browser-wars/builds || echo 'already deleted') && mkdir source/browser-wars/builds && hash="$(date +%s )" && uglifyjs --compress --output source/browser-wars/builds/data.${hash}.min.js -- source/browser-wars/data.js &&  uglifyjs --compress --output source/browser-wars/builds/chart.${hash}.min.js -- source/browser-wars/chart.js && node source/browser-wars/build.js $hash
